articles.title: What do I need to know about the Moderna vaccine? And how does it compare with Pfizer? - The Conversation AU
articles.description: Doses of the Moderna vaccine will be available in Australia from mid-September. So if you’re in an eligible group you could be offered either Pfizer or Moderna. Here’s how they compare.
articles.content:
Australias medical regulator has provisionally approved another COVID-19 vaccine, Moderna, for use in Australia.
